short_summary: TBIPS Solicitation for Senior Programmer Analysts and a Senior Quality Assurance Analyst
description: This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of Public Service Commission (the "Client") for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: TBIPS Solicitation**
======================================================

### Solicitation Title

* English: TBIPS Solicitation for Senior Programmer Analysts and a Senior Quality Assurance Analyst
* French: Appel d'offres pour des analystes-programmeurs seniors et une analyste principale en assurance de la qualité

### Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-96-33970034
* Amendment Number: 5
* Solicitation Number: TBIPS-23-0029

### Tender Details
* Publication Date: 2023-12-01
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-11T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2024-01-11
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-08
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-01-07

### Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contracting Entity
* Name: Public Service Commission
* Address: 22 Eddy Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 2V6, Canada

### Contact Information
* Name: Najwa Ferzly
* Email: najwa.ferzly@cfp-psc.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-999-9999

### Tender Description
This bid solicitation aims to satisfy the Public Service Commission's requirement for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply. The requirement is for up to three (3) contracts, each for a term of one (1) year, plus four (4) one-year irrevocable options. This procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

The objective is to provide advice, expertise, and support for business analysts, business stakeholders, and the Public Service Commission's Applications Development team. The requirement is for a Senior Programmer Analyst and/or a Senior Quality Assurance Analyst to provide their expertise on an “As and When Required” basis, Task Authorization Contract.

To obtain a copy of the tender notice, please visit the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26464/con23-0029-npp-for-solicitation-tbips-
